edu.cuny.cat.trader.strategy
Interface FixedQuantityStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
AuctionEventListener, java.lang.Cloneable, Prototypeable, Resetable, Strategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaptiveStrategyImpl, DiscreteLearnerStrategy, FixedQuantityStrategyImpl, GDLStrategy, GDStrategy, MomentumStrategy, PriestVanTolStrategy, PureSimpleStrategy, RandomConstrainedStrategy, StimuliResponseStrategy, TruthTellingStrategy, ZIPStrategy, ZIQStrategy
public interface FixedQuantityStrategy
extends Strategy

Strategies implementing this interface indicate that they bid a constant quantity in each auction round.

Version:
$Revision: 1.8 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
